articles.author: STAN CHOE
articles.title: Stock market today: Most of Wall Street sinks after inflation worsens - The Associated Press
articles.description: Most U.S. stocks fell after a report said inflation is unexpectedly worsening for Americans. The S&P 500 dropped 0.3% Wednesday, though it had been on track for a much worse loss of 1.1% at the start of trading. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 0.5%, whi…
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) Most U.S. stocks fell Wednesday after a report showed inflation is unexpectedly worsening for Americans. 
The S&P 500 dropped 0.3%, though it had been on track for a much worse los… [+4741 chars]

articles.author: Robin Givhan
articles.title: Column | Trump’s attack on the Kennedy Center is petty but powerful - The Washington Post
articles.description: The president doesn’t merely want to break the government bureaucracy. He wants to reprogram what the arts mean to the American people.
articles.content: President Donald Trumps intention to take control of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts is at first glance a demonstration of pettiness that would, in the past, have been nearly unbel… [+6325 chars]
